title: Dive Into Fun At Montair - 2 Exterior Pools Will Keep You Cool
posting_body: Active Duty Military Specials - Call today for more information!
Want more information on this unit?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 951 Sq.
Move Over Mountains - Montair is Calling!
Mount Rainier views, Puget Sound, and large apartments and townhomes offering plenty of room to breathe.
Montair at Somerset Hill is made for those who like city tastes blended with small-town charm, as only the Olympia area can provide.
Choose modern living in a quaint, sought after neighborhood, in a professionally designed, spacious, newly renovated apartment home.
Designer finishes place you in the lap of luxury, while large patios call you to the outside.
Amenity spaces are made to impress, being the perfect bridge to the great outdoors.
Relax at one of the two outdoor community pools, throw a small party in the courtyard with fire pit lounge, or take the kids to the playground in a beautiful park-like setting.
If the weather’s not cooperating, hit the full-sized indoor basketball court, fitness center or spa.

When you feel like showing your social side, we’ve got weekly resident events, and if restaurants and brewpubs beckon, exceptional freeway access quickly connects you to all the flavor of Olympia’s downtown lifestyle.
- Mount Rainier, Puget Sound, and State Capitol Views*
- Mount Rainier, Puget Sound, and State Capitol Views
No Weight Limits, Breed Restrictions Apply.
From I5, Take Exit 104 onto Highway 101.
exit and head east on Crosby Blvd.
up the hill and turn left onto Barnes Blvd.
Our office is a little less than a mile up the hill on the left hand side!
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
